Course Name: Field Experience: Experiential Learning in the Visual Arts (1-3)An undergraduate, experience-based learning activity carried out in a visual arts setting. Prerequisite: junior standing or above with a major of art education (ARTE) or art history (ARTH) or fine arts (ARTS) and special approval of faculty sponsor.40008 Professional Practices in the Visual Arts
Description: Introduction to the concerns and practices of the professional artist/craftsperson.
